metadata.title: CVE-2024-26915 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: Reset IH OVERFLOW_CLEAR bitAllows us to detect subsequent IH ring buffer overflows as well.
